resources.string: If you deny permission, you can not use this service. Please turn on permissions in [Setup]-> [Permission]
Please choose 2.4 GHz WiFi for your scale. If your router has only one WiFi choose that one. If your router has two WiFi networks, make sure you choose 2.4 GHz network, NOT the 5 GHz network.

You can skip this step, if you have already setup WiFi for your scale. Please choose 2.4 GHz WiFi for your scale. If your router has only one WiFi choose that one. If your router has two WiFi networks, make sure you choose 2.4 GHz network, NOT the 5 GHz network.

1) Please enter your WiFi network name and password. 

2) Tap “Confirm” to confirm that the network name and password is accurate. 

3) Follow the instructions on the screen.
To Know Your Weight follow the steps below :
1. With scale placed on sturdy, leveled and hard surface, step on the scale bare footed.
2. The digits displaying weight will blink three times, and a dotted line will show up three times, after that step down the scale.
3. Continue doing so several times a week.
1. Step on the scale and measure your weight
2. Scale start blinking and with your weight & stop
Please Select Weight Managment Goal Type
I am having all the info.
I agree to all the Terms and Conditions
Battery Low! Please change the battery in scale immediately.
Battery Low! Please change the battery in scale very soon.
Show My Performance To The Primary User

Let\'s try another method to setup WiFi on scale, the current method is not suitable for your network. Please remove the batteries from the scale and put them back. Press and hold the Black button in the batteries compartment until you see \'AP\' next to the WiFi symbol. Release the button. Tap on AP Config below.
Allow accountability circle members to view my:
No scale ID found associated with your account, please have the primary user registered before you login.
You have signed up successfully. For you to start using the service, please have the primary user to complete his/her registration process.
Press update button to update the profile image
Frequent messaging with your accountability circle members is a good idea
Please enter your desired weight and time
Please choose one of the options, “Accept SureFiz Weight” or “I Will Provide Weight and Time”
Time To Lose Weight Will Be Calculated After The First Weight

Sign up is complete. Your free scale will arrive within 2 to 5 business days of your purchase from Amazon. When you receive your scale, login into the SureFiz mobile App, with email ID and password created during signup. Your email will be validated during app login. Alternatively, you can validate your email by clicking on the verification link we have sent to you to your email address.

Sign up is complete. Log into the SureFiz mobile App, with email ID and password created during signup. Your email will be validated during app login. Alternatively, you can validate your email by clicking on the verification link we have sent to you to your email address.

After you tap on "AP Config" button follow the steps below:

1. A list of WIFI will open.
2. Select the
from the list\n\nJust wait for few seconds and you are done.
